Pemkot Bandung Tunggak Kompensasi Sampah Sejak 2013
02 Nov 2019, 11:17 by Cecep Wijaya Sari
NGAMPRAH, (PR).- Komisi III DPRD Kabupaten Bandung Barat meminta Pemerintah KBB menutup akses pembuangan sampah dari Kota Bandung ke TPA Sarimukti, Kecamatan Cipatat. Sebab, Pemerintah Kota Bandung belum melunasi pembayaran kompensasi dampak negatif (KDN) dari pembuangan sampah sejak 2013, sehingga menyisakan utang kepada Pemerintah KBB sebesar Rp 3,2 miliar.
Ketua Komisi III DPRD KBB, Iwan Ridwan mengungkapkan bahwa tunggakan Pemkot Bandung tersebut terus menjadi temuan Badan Pemeriksa Keuangan setiap tahun. Pihaknya juga sudah melakukan inspeksi ke tiga desa yang langsung terdampak pembuangan sampah ke TPA Sarimukti, yakni Desa Sarimukti, Mandalasari, dan Rajamandala di Kecamatan Cipatat.
“Alasan Kota Bandung tidak mau membayar KDN ritase ke Pemda KBB karena merasa sudah membayarnya langsung ke masyarakat. Sejak tahun 2006-2013 saat belum muncul Perbup, memang KDN yang terbagi tonase dan ritase itu dibayarkan langsung ke warga,” ujarnya, Jumat 1 November 2019.
Dia mengungkapkan, ongkos KDN untuk tonase, yaitu Rp7.500/ton, sementara untuk ritase Rp15.000. Sekarang, per harinya ada sekitar 400 truk dari Kota Bandung, Kabupaten Bandung, Cimahi, dan KBB yang masuk ke Sarimukti dengan volume sampah 6 ton/truk. 
"Untuk tunggakan hutang yang Kota Bandung itu adalah dari ritase. Sebab di awal beroperasi TPA Sarimukti saat itu, truk sampah yang masuk ke Cipatat keluarnya melalui Cipeundeuy, Cikalongwetan. Namun karena kejauhan akhirnya truk balik lagi ke Cipatat sehingga ada efisiensi BBM sekitar Rp35.000/sekali jalan. Nah, berdasarkan kesepakatan akhirnya Rp15.000 dibayarkan untuk kompensasi ritase ke warga terdampak di tiga desa," tuturnya.
Terkait dengan hal itu, Iwan mengungkapkan, pihaknya akan melakukan audiensi dengan Gubernur Jabar untuk mengatasi persoalan ini. Khusus untuk Kota Bandung, menurut dia, pihaknya meminta agar tidak membuang sampah ke Sarimukti jika tidak ditemukan win-win solution.
Sementara itu, Kepala Dinas Lingkungan Hidup Kabupaten Bandung Barat, Apung Hadiat Purwoko mengungkapkan, persoalan KDN Kota Bandung pada tahun tersebut terjadi ketika UPT Kebersihan masih di bawah Dinas Cipta Karya dan Tata Ruang. Baru pada 2019 ini, UPT Kebersihan berada di bawah Dinas Lingkungan Hidup.
“Jadi untuk persoalan tahun sebelumnya, itu bukan kewenangan kami untuk menjawabnya. Namun pada tahun ini, semua daerah termasuk Kota Bandung memberikan KDN sesuai dengan Perbup,” ujar Apung.***

Bandung City Government Has Delayed Waste Compensation Since 2013
02 Nov 2019, 11:17 by Cecep Wijaya Sari
NGAMPRAH, (PR) .- Commission III of the West Bandung Regency DPRD asked the KBB Government to close access to garbage disposal from the city of Bandung to the Sarimukti TPA, Cipatat District. Because, the Bandung City Government has not paid the negative impact compensation (KDN) payment from waste disposal since 2013, thus leaving a debt to the KBB Government of Rp 3.2 billion.
Chairman of Commission III of the KBB DPRD, Iwan Ridwan, revealed that the arrears of the Bandung City Government continued to be a finding of the Supreme Audit Board every year. He said he had also inspected three villages directly affected by the disposal of garbage to Sarimukti TPA, namely Sarimukti, Mandalasari and Rajamandala villages in Cipatat District.
"The reason the city of Bandung does not want to pay KDN Ritase to the KBB Regional Government is because they feel that they have paid directly to the community. Since 2006-2013, when Perbup had not yet appeared, KDN, which was divided into tonnages and ritase, was paid directly to residents, "he said, Friday, November 1, 2019.
He revealed, KDN costs for tonnage, which is Rp7,500 / ton, while for Rp15,000 ritase. Now, there are around 400 trucks per day from the city of Bandung, Bandung regency, Cimahi, and KBB which enter Sarimukti with 6 tons of garbage / truck volume.
"For the arrears of debt that the City of Bandung was from ritase. Because at the beginning of the Sarimukti landfill operation at that time, garbage trucks entering Cipatat were discharged through Cipeundeuy, Cikalongwetan. But due to the distance the trucks finally returned to Cipatat so that there was a fuel efficiency of around Rp35,000 "One way. Now, based on the agreement, finally Rp.15,000 is paid for social compensation to affected residents in three villages," he said.
Related to this, Iwan revealed, his party would hold an audience with the Governor of West Java to overcome this problem. Specifically for the city of Bandung, according to him, his party requested that the trash not be disposed of in Sarimukti if a win-win solution was not found.
Meanwhile, the Head of the West Bandung Regency Environmental Agency, Apung Hadiat Purwoko revealed, the Bandung City KDN problem that year occurred when UPT Cleanliness was still under the Cipta Karya and Spatial Planning Office. Only in this 2019, UPT Cleanliness is under the Department of the Environment.
"So for the problems of the previous year, it is not our authority to answer them. But this year, all regions including the City of Bandung provide KDN in accordance with Perbup, "said Apung. ***
